emdi_schema.description: On-board EMDI detection that obtains packet header information to sample multicast quality data.

monitor-period.description: EMDI monitoring period, which controls the detection interval.

suppress-times.description: Alarm suppression time. When the number of consecutive detection periods during which a specified alarm threshold is reached exceeds a specified suppression threshold, an alarm is generated.

loss-rate-threshold-sd.description: Threshold for generating an SD channel packet loss alarm.

loss-rate-threshold-hd.description: Threshold for generating an HD channel packet loss alarm.

loss-rate-threshold-4k.description: Threshold for generating a 4K channel packet loss alarm.

disorder-rate-threshold-sd.description: Threshold for generating an SD channel packet disorder alarm.

disorder-rate-threshold-hd.description: Alarm threshold for the packet disorder rate of HD channels.

disorder-rate-threshold-4k.description: Alarm threshold for the packet disorder rate of 4K channels.

mpls-enable.description: In the P node scenario, enable MPLS tunnel detection to ensure that the P node detection function is proper.

jitter-enable.description: Whether to enable the jitter detection function for multicast packets.

monitor-rate-only.description: Only packet rate information is detected.

emdi-channel-groups.description: List of configure channel group information. Multiple channels can be bound to a channel group.

emdi-channel-group.description: Configure channel group information. Multiple channels can be bound to a channel group.

emdi-channel.description: Configure channel information. The group-address and source-address combination of different instances cannot overlap.

vpn-name.description: Specify the name of a VPN instance. Multicast traffic is bound to a VPN tunnel.
Specify the name of a VPN instance. Multicast traffic is bound to a VPN tunnel.

vlan-id.description: VLAN information. Multicast traffic is bound to VLANs.
VLAN information. Multicast traffic is bound to VLANs.

vsi-name.description: Name of a VSI. Multicast traffic is bound to a VSI tunnel.
Name of a VSI. Multicast traffic is bound to a VSI tunnel.

bd-id.description: DB information. Multicast traffic is bound to a BD.
DB information. Multicast traffic is bound to a BD.

transit.description: In the P node scenario, enable the transit detection function to ensure that the P node detection function is proper.
In the P node scenario, enable the transit detection function to ensure that the P node detection function is proper.

pt-value.description: Payload type. Only payload type (PT) videos are detected.

uncompressed.description: Whether non-compressed multicast traffic detection is enabled.

emdi-bier-channels.description: List of configure bier channel information.

bier-vpn-name.description: Specify the name of a VPN instance. Multicast traffic is bound to a VPN tunnel.

sub-domain.description: The bier sub-domain.

emdi-lpu-groups.description: List of configure Board group information.

channel-group-bind-lpu-groups.description: List of configure binding between a channel group and a board.

channel-group-bind-lpu-group.description: Configure binding between a channel group and a board.

lpu-group-name.description: Name of a bound board group.

channel-group-name.description: Name of a bound channel group.

outbound-channel-group-bind-lpu-groups.description: List of configure outbound binding between a channel group and a board.

outbound-channel-group-bind-lpu-group.description: Configure outbound binding between a channel group and a board.

lpu-group-name.description: Name of a bound board group.

channel-group-name.description: Name of a bound channel group.

lpu-group-name.description: Name of a bound board group.

emdi-history-records.description: List of query historical EMDI detection state.

record-index.description: Index of each detection message. The value 0 indicates that no abnormal flow.

record-time.description: Time when each piece of information is detected.

monitor-period.description: Detection period of each detection message.

monitor-status.description: Detection status of each detection message.

rate-pps.description: Rate (pps) at which packets are received.

rate-bps.description: Rate (bit/s) at which packets are received.

lost-packet.description: Number of lost packets on a channel.

rtp-lr.description: Packet loss rate of a channel.

rtp-jitter.description: Check the jitter of the channel.

slot-id.description: Slot ID.

bier-history-records.description: List of query historical BIER EMDI detection state.

bier-history-record.description: Query historical BIER EMDI detection state.

vpn-label.description: Vpn label of vpn in bier.

sub-domain.description: Bier sub domain.

record-index.description: Index of each detection message. The value 0 indicates that no abnormal flow.

slot-id.description: Slot ID.

record-time.description: Time when each piece of information is detected.

monitor-period.description: Detection period of each detection message.

monitor-status.description: Detection status of each detection message.

rate-bps.description: Rate (bit/s) at which packets are received.

lost-packet.description: Number of lost packets on a channel.

rtp-lr.description: Packet loss rate of a channel.

vr-id.description: Index of the VR that the channel belongs to.

channel-source-address.description: IPv4 source adddress of the multicast channel.

channel-group-address.description: IPv4 group adddress of the multicast channel.

channel-vpn-type.description: The VPN type that the multicast channel belongs to.

vpn-name.description: The L3VPN name of the multicast channel.

report-period.description: The EMDI statistics data report period.

report-time.description: The report time of current report period.

total-recv-packets.description: The total received RTP packets number in current report period.

total-loss-packets.description: The total lost RTP packets number in current report period.

total-disorderd-packets.description: The total disordered RTP packets number in current report period.

monitor-period.description: The EMDI statistics data monitor period.

monitor-time.description: The start time of current monitor period.

worst-recv-packets.description: The received RTP packets number in the worst monitor period in current report period.

worst-disorderd-packets.description: The disordered RTP packets number in the worst monitor period in current report period.

sub-domain.description: Bier sub domain.

record-index.description: Index of each detection message. The value 0 indicates that no abnormal flow.

slot-id.description: Slot ID.

record-time.description: Time when each piece of information is detected.

monitor-period.description: Detection period of each detection message.

monitor-status.description: Detection status of each detection message.

rate-pps.description: Rate (pps) at which packets are received.

rate-bps.description: Rate (bit/s) at which packets are received.

lost-packet.description: Number of lost packets on a channel.

rtp-lr.description: Packet loss rate of a channel.
